A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Changing the writer made it inconsistent\, messy\, and feel very contrived. The jokes were completely the wrong tone for Star Wars\, definitely giving in to the trend of self-referential humor\, instead of something more in line with\, well\, essentially a story about war. It seems such a waste not to use all of the material from the novels instead! Still not as bad as the prequels\, but does that really need to be the bar we lower it to? Can we at least scrap this and start over from where Force Awakens left off? Help us JJ Abrams\, you're our only hope! Or Zahn... I don't care\, just someone\, anyone help fix it!
